amendment.description: Amendment provides that none of the funds used for the Army Corps of Engineers Upper Mississippi River-Illinois Waterway System Navigation Study may be used to study any portion of the Upper Mississippi River located above Lock and Dam 14 at Moline, Illinois, and Bettendorf, Iowa.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to specify that none of the funds made available in the bill for the Army Corps of Engineers Upper Mississippi River-Illinois Waterway System Navigation Study shall not be used to study any portion of the Upper Mississippi River above the dam at Moline, Illinois. The amendment would exempt any system-wide environmental baseline study conducted pursuant to the National Environmental Policy Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gunderson amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.
